message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its worth to me.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. However, the product's value to me is quite high.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value to me, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
